3.name: Eni-sensei
3.text:
"Well then... From this moment on, this forest
will be Sol's territory. The inhabitants of this
forest are the ones you will protect."

4.name: Sol
4.text:
"Ooooooh... My territory...! Understood! I will
protect it a lot!! I will protect it from the bad
guys!!"

5.name: Eni-sensei
5.text:
"Very well. Now then... with this, Sol has passed
the graduation exam."

6.name: Eni-sensei
6.text:
"However, Sol, you are still a fledgling dragon.
Both your physical body and your way of fighting
are still immature and clumsy."

7.name: Eni-sensei
7.text:
"To be honest, you're still very weak. You're like
a snack for trolls. I could defeat them with a
flick on the forehead."

9.name: Eni-sensei
9.text:
"Even if you pout in protest, it won't change the
fact."

10.name: Eni-sensei
10.text:
"First, descend the mountain and visit the
adventurers' tavern in the village at the foot.
There are surely adventurers who will help you and
Sol."

11.name: Eni-sensei
11.text:
"Since Sol's body is still small, there are few
who can carry her on their backs..."

12.name: Eni-sensei
12.text:
"From now on, you will continue to grow, molt, and
your body as a dragon will become larger and
larger. Then, the number of people who can carry
you at once will also increase."

13.name: Eni-sensei
13.text:
"First, go on an adventure, protect your
territory, gather treasures, make friends, and
learn a lot to grow. Do you understand?"

16.name: Eni-sensei
16.text:
"Well then, my teachings are over. With this, you
are at least for now, more or less a full-fledged
dragon."

18.name: Eni-sensei
18.text:
"From now on, you will move forward with your own
wings."

19.name: Eni-sensei
19.text:
"Well then, from here on, I will set out on a
journey once again. However, if Sol wishes it, we
will surely be able to meet again soon."

20.name: Eni-sensei
20.text:
"I look forward to seeing how much you have grown
at that time."

21.name: Sol
21.text:
"Y-Yes, Sensei!! Thank you so much for everything
up until now!! Thank you for raising me!!"

26.name: Eni-sensei
26.text:
"......I did say that, but the truth is, I've
become attached during these two years of raising
you."

27.name: Eni-sensei
27.text:
"For a while, I'll travel around this area and
make sure I can come running whenever you need
me."

28.name: Eni-sensei
28.text:
"If Aisha, my student, were to see me on that day,
she would probably laugh and say I've become quite
soft. I've ended up becoming a mother, despite
being unmarried."
